sentences.en: ‘Of course I don’t mind,’ she answered mildly.
sentences.cn: “我当然不介意。”她温和地答道。

sentences.en: " I can't pay you anything on that to - day, " he said, mildly.
sentences.cn: “ 可今天我付不了你一分钱, " 他温和地说.

sentences.en: " Yes, " answered Carrie, mildly, overwhelmed by the man's assurance.
sentences.cn: “ 是的, " 嘉莉温和地回答, 被这个男人的自信征服了.

sentences.en: "I'm not meddling," Kenworthy said mildly, "I'm just curious."
sentences.cn: “我不是在多管闲事，”肯沃西温和地说，“我只是好奇罢了。”

sentences.en: But not all the money, to put it mildly, has been used wisely.
sentences.cn: 但是说得委婉一些，并不是所有的钱都花得很明智。

sentences.en: He gave Robin a mildly quizzical glance.
sentences.cn: 他有些惊讶地瞥了罗宾一眼。

sentences.en: He is in the marriage bureau business, which is mildly ironic seeing that his dearest wish is to get married himself.
sentences.cn: 他从事婚姻介绍工作，这多少有点讽刺意味，因为他最大的愿望就是自己能结婚。

sentences.en: He is precise and mildly donnish in manner.
sentences.cn: 他一丝不苟，带着几分学究气。

sentences.en: Molasses are mildly laxative and something of a general tonic.
sentences.cn: 糖蜜有些许通便作用，兼具强身功能。

sentences.en: Not all the money, to put it mildly, has been used wisely.
sentences.cn: 说得好听些，不是所有的钱都花得是地方。

sentences.en: Robert Kincaid was perspiring mildly; his top two shirt buttons undone.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特.金凯微微出着汗, 衬衫的头两个扣子解开着.

sentences.en: Saying that Joan was taken aback is to put it mildly. She was completely flabbergasted.
sentences.cn: 说琼吃了一惊,这是很保守的说法. 她其实是完全惊呆了.

sentences.en: The drug is only mildly addictive.
sentences.cn: 这种药物只会轻度致瘾。

sentences.en: the proposals were, to put it mildly, unpopular.
sentences.cn: 客气点说，这些建议是不受欢迎的。

sentences.en: To say we are disappointed about this is putting it mildly.
sentences.cn: 说我们对此很失望是很客气的说法。

words.tran_cn: 温和的；轻微的；淡味的；文雅的；不含有害物质的的

phrases.phrase: to put it mildly (或 putting it mildly)

trans.tran_cn: 和善地，轻微地，说得委婉些，说得好听一点
